meanings.definition: A thin, lighted tube used in laparoscopic surgery to examine the abdominal cavity.
meanings.sent1: The laparoscope helped the doctor see inside the belly during the operation.
meanings.sent2: The surgeon carefully inserted the laparoscope into the patient's abdomen.
meanings.sent3: The laparoscope felt like a tiny flashlight exploring a dark cave.
meanings.sent4: Her curiosity was a laparoscope, delving into the mysteries of the human body.
meanings.sent5: The gleaming laparoscope illuminated the hidden secrets of the abdomen.

meanings.definition: To perform a laparoscopy using a laparoscope.
meanings.sent1: The doctor will laparoscope the patient to diagnose the issue.
meanings.sent2: She carefully laparoscoped to identify the source of the pain.
meanings.sent3: He jokingly said he could laparoscope with his eyes closed.
meanings.sent4: Their investigation skills were so sharp, it was like they could laparoscope minds.
meanings.sent5: The detective decided to laparoscope the crime scene for clues.
